author: Laura A. Bischoff
title: Gov. Mike DeWine touts Intel deal, economic growth in his State of State address

sentence: COLUMBUS, Ohio (WCMH)– Ohio Governor Mike DeWine dedicated nearly one-fifth of his State of the State address Wednesday to the state’s growing mental health crisis.
author: Kristine Varkony
title: Gov. DeWine emphasizes need for mental health resources in State of State address

sentence: For the first time in two years Governor Mike Dewine delivered Ohio’s State of the State speech.
title: Governor and Pam Dive More Into State of State Speech
